contact.p1: I hope you liked my profile! 😊

project_info.title: About the Project
project_info.description: This website has been fully designed and implemented by me. When creating projects for myself, I strive to ensure a modern tech stack, optimal user experience, and low maintenance costs.
packages_list: nuxtjs/supabase - backend implementation with BaaS from Supabase,
nuxt/icon - a base of free customizable icons,
nuxt/fonts - a base and easy retrieval of fonts.

offer.description_1: I am a developer with experience, familiar with modern technological trends. I create modern websites based on the latest tools.
offer.offer_for: My offer is aimed at people who:
offer_for_list: 🌱 Create something valuable and want to stand out online
🐾 Plan to refresh their visual identity
🌐 Are dissatisfied with their current website
😡 Want to avoid high maintenance costs and annoying subscriptions
offer_pros_list: ⚡ Modern technologies and fast performance (no WordPress or similar tools)
🎨 A custom graphic design tailored to your needs
📞 Full responsiveness – works correctly on every device
📈 SEO optimization and high search engine ranking
🍬 Additional features such as dark mode, multilingual support, animations, blog, etc.
🎣 Full control over content and data – or the option to delegate management to me
💰 No unnecessary recurring costs (only domain fees)
💬 Ongoing support and the possibility of future updates

form.p2: If so, that's great! Send me a message, and I'll get back to you. 😊
